statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_name, inquiry_timestamp FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_id > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_timestamp FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_inquiries FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT inquiry_text, customer_id FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT response_text FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE inquiry_id = 12345;
SELECT MAX(response_timestamp) AS latest_response_time FROM ChatbotResponses;
SELECT inquiry_id, COUNT(*) AS num_responses FROM ChatbotResponses GROUP BY inquiry_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY inquiry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(inquiry_id) AS total_inquiries FROM CustomerInquiries GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_inquiries > 1;
SELECT response_text FROM ChatbotResponses INNER JOIN CustomerInquiries ON ChatbotResponses.inquiry_id = CustomerInquiries.inquiry_id WHERE inquiry_text LIKE '%refund%';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries LEFT JOIN ChatbotResponses ON CustomerInquiries.inquiry_id = ChatbotResponses.inquiry_id ORDER BY CustomerInquiries.customer_id ASC, ChatbotResponses.response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChatbotLogs WHERE inquiry_id = 12345;
SELECT response_id, response_date FROM CustomerResponses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_message FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 54321;
SELECT AVG(response_score) AS average_score FROM ChatbotLogs;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_message FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT c.customer_id, c.inquiry_date, r.response_date, r.response_message FROM CustomerInquiries c JOIN CustomerResponses r ON c.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.inquiry_message, l.chatbot_response, l.response_score FROM CustomerInquiries c JOIN ChatbotLogs l ON c.inquiry_id = l.inquiry_id WHERE l.response_score > 0.8 ORDER BY l.response_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_message LIKE '%urgent%' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerResponses);
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM InquiryFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM InquiryAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text, inquiry_status FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_status IN ('Resolved', 'Closed') ORDER BY inquiry_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM InquiryFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_inquiries FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT response_text FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE inquiry_id = 5;
SELECT topic_name FROM InquiryTopics ORDER BY topic_id DESC;
SELECT inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT response_text FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE inquiry_id = 2;
SELECT analysis_result FROM InquiryAnalysis WHERE topic_id = 3 AND analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CommonTrends ORDER BY trend_date ASC LIMIT 3;
